category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AW_Advanced_Search_Reference_Sort_property
preference.preference_description: Specifies the attribute used to sort search results for typed reference properties. For example, consider the "owning_user" typed reference property of Item, its "user_name" attribute can be used to sort all Items. Valid values are in the format "typedReferenceProperty.attribute". Search results show objects of the same business object type. If a preference value refers to a property that does not exist for the type, the preference value is not used for sorting.
